39/*
40 * XXXRTH We could use a static event...
41 */
42
43static char hex_digits[] = {
44 '0', '1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6', '7',
45 '8', '9', 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f'
46};
47
48isc_result_t
49dns_byaddr_createptrname(const isc_netaddr_t *address, unsigned int options,
50 dns_name_t *name)
51{
52 char textname[128];
53 const unsigned char *bytes;
54 int i;
55 char *cp;
56 isc_buffer_t buffer;
57 unsigned int len;
58
59 REQUIRE(address != NULL);
60 UNUSED(options);
61
62 /*
63 * We create the text representation and then convert to a
64 * dns_name_t. This is not maximally efficient, but it keeps all
65 * of the knowledge of wire format in the dns_name_ routines.
66 */
67
68 bytes = (const unsigned char *)(&address->type);
69 if (address->family == AF_INET) {
70 (void)snprintf(textname, sizeof(textname),
71 "%u.%u.%u.%u.in-addr.arpa.",
72 ((unsigned int)bytes[3] & 0xffU),
73 ((unsigned int)bytes[2] & 0xffU),
74 ((unsigned int)bytes[1] & 0xffU),
75 ((unsigned int)bytes[0] & 0xffU));
76 } else if (address->family == AF_INET6) {
77 size_t remaining;
78
79 cp = textname;
80 for (i = 15; i >= 0; i--) {
81 *cp++ = hex_digits[bytes[i] & 0x0f];
82 *cp++ = '.';
83 *cp++ = hex_digits[(bytes[i] >> 4) & 0x0f];
84 *cp++ = '.';
85 }
86 remaining = sizeof(textname) - (cp - textname);
87 strlcpy(cp, "ip6.arpa.", remaining);
88 } else
89 return (ISC_R_NOTIMPLEMENTED);
90
91 len = (unsigned int)strlen(textname);
92 isc_buffer_init(&buffer, textname, len);
93 isc_buffer_add(&buffer, len);
94 return (dns_name_fromtext(name, &buffer, dns_rootname, 0, NULL));
95}
96
97struct dns_byaddr {
98 /* Unlocked. */
99 unsigned int magic;
100 isc_mem_t * mctx;
101 isc_mutex_t lock;
102 dns_fixedname_t name;
103 /* Locked by lock. */
104 unsigned int options;
105 dns_lookup_t * lookup;
106 isc_task_t * task;
107 dns_byaddrevent_t * event;
108 bool canceled;
109};
110
111#define BYADDR_MAGIC ISC_MAGIC('B', 'y', 'A', 'd')
112#define VALID_BYADDR(b) ISC_MAGIC_VALID(b, BYADDR_MAGIC)
113
114#define MAX_RESTARTS 16
115
116static inline isc_result_t
117copy_ptr_targets(dns_byaddr_t *byaddr, dns_rdataset_t *rdataset) {
118 isc_result_t result;
119 dns_name_t *name;
120 dns_rdata_t rdata = DNS_RDATA_INIT;
121
122 /*
123 * The caller must be holding the byaddr's lock.
124 */
125
126 result = dns_rdataset_first(rdataset);
127 while (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
128 dns_rdata_ptr_t ptr;
129 dns_rdataset_current(rdataset, &rdata);
130 result = dns_rdata_tostruct(&rdata, &ptr, NULL);
131 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
132 return (result);
133 name = isc_mem_get(byaddr->mctx, sizeof(*name));
134 if (name == NULL) {
135 dns_rdata_freestruct(&ptr);
136 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
137 }
138 dns_name_init(name, NULL);
139 result = dns_name_dup(&ptr.ptr, byaddr->mctx, name);
140 dns_rdata_freestruct(&ptr);
141 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
142 isc_mem_put(byaddr->mctx, name, sizeof(*name));
143 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
144 }
145 ISC_LIST_APPEND(byaddr->event->names, name, link);
146 dns_rdata_reset(&rdata);
147 result = dns_rdataset_next(rdataset);
148 }
149 if (result == ISC_R_NOMORE)
150 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
151
152 return (result);
153}
154
155static void
156lookup_done(isc_task_t *task, isc_event_t *event) {
157 dns_byaddr_t *byaddr = event->ev_arg;
158 dns_lookupevent_t *levent;
159 isc_result_t result;
160
161 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_LOOKUPDONE);
162 REQUIRE(VALID_BYADDR(byaddr));
163 REQUIRE(byaddr->task == task);
164
165 UNUSED(task);
166
167 levent = (dns_lookupevent_t *)event;
168
169 if (levent->result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
170 result = copy_ptr_targets(byaddr, levent->rdataset);
171 byaddr->event->result = result;
172 } else
173 byaddr->event->result = levent->result;
174 isc_event_free(&event);
175 isc_task_sendanddetach(&byaddr->task, (isc_event_t **)(void *)&byaddr->event);
176}
177
178static void
179bevent_destroy(isc_event_t *event) {
180 dns_byaddrevent_t *bevent;
181 dns_name_t *name, *next_name;
182 isc_mem_t *mctx;
183
184 REQUIRE(event->ev_type == DNS_EVENT_BYADDRDONE);
185 mctx = event->ev_destroy_arg;
186 bevent = (dns_byaddrevent_t *)event;
187
188 for (name = ISC_LIST_HEAD(bevent->names);
189 name != NULL;
190 name = next_name) {
191 next_name = ISC_LIST_NEXT(name, link);
192 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(bevent->names, name, link);
193 dns_name_free(name, mctx);
194 isc_mem_put(mctx, name, sizeof(*name));
195 }
196 isc_mem_put(mctx, event, event->ev_size);
197}
198
199isc_result_t
200dns_byaddr_create(isc_mem_t *mctx, const isc_netaddr_t *address,
201 dns_view_t *view, unsigned int options, isc_task_t *task,
202 isc_taskaction_t action, void *arg, dns_byaddr_t **byaddrp)
203{
204 isc_result_t result;
205 dns_byaddr_t *byaddr;
206 isc_event_t *ievent;
207
208 byaddr = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*byaddr));
209 if (byaddr == NULL)
210 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
211 byaddr->mctx = NULL;
212 isc_mem_attach(mctx, &byaddr->mctx);
213 byaddr->options = options;
214
215 byaddr->event = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*byaddr->event));
216 if (byaddr->event == NULL) {
217 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
218 goto cleanup_byaddr;
219 }
220 ISC_EVENT_INIT(byaddr->event, sizeof(*byaddr->event), 0, NULL,
221 DNS_EVENT_BYADDRDONE, action, arg, byaddr,
222 bevent_destroy, mctx);
223 byaddr->event->result = ISC_R_FAILURE;
224 ISC_LIST_INIT(byaddr->event->names);
225
226 byaddr->task = NULL;
227 isc_task_attach(task, &byaddr->task);
228
229 isc_mutex_init(&byaddr->lock);
230
231 dns_fixedname_init(&byaddr->name);
232
233 result = dns_byaddr_createptrname(address, options,
234 dns_fixedname_name(&byaddr->name));
235 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
236 goto cleanup_lock;
237
238 byaddr->lookup = NULL;
239 result = dns_lookup_create(mctx, dns_fixedname_name(&byaddr->name),
240 dns_rdatatype_ptr, view, 0, task,
241 lookup_done, byaddr, &byaddr->lookup);
242 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
243 goto cleanup_lock;
244
245 byaddr->canceled = false;
246 byaddr->magic = BYADDR_MAGIC;
247
248 *byaddrp = byaddr;
249
250 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
251
252 cleanup_lock:
253 isc_mutex_destroy(&byaddr->lock);
254
255 ievent = (isc_event_t *)byaddr->event;
256 isc_event_free(&ievent);
257 byaddr->event = NULL;
258
259 isc_task_detach(&byaddr->task);
260
261 cleanup_byaddr:
262 isc_mem_putanddetach(&mctx, byaddr, sizeof(*byaddr));
263
264 return (result);
265}
266
267void
268dns_byaddr_cancel(dns_byaddr_t *byaddr) {
269 REQUIRE(VALID_BYADDR(byaddr));
270
271 LOCK(&byaddr->lock);
272
273 if (!byaddr->canceled) {
274 byaddr->canceled = true;
275 if (byaddr->lookup != NULL)
276 dns_lookup_cancel(byaddr->lookup);
277 }
278
279 UNLOCK(&byaddr->lock);
280}
281
282void
283dns_byaddr_destroy(dns_byaddr_t **byaddrp) {
284 dns_byaddr_t *byaddr;
285
286 REQUIRE(byaddrp != NULL);
287 byaddr = *byaddrp;
288 REQUIRE(VALID_BYADDR(byaddr));
289 REQUIRE(byaddr->event == NULL);
290 REQUIRE(byaddr->task == NULL);
291 dns_lookup_destroy(&byaddr->lookup);
292
293 isc_mutex_destroy(&byaddr->lock);
294 byaddr->magic = 0;
295 isc_mem_putanddetach(&byaddr->mctx, byaddr, sizeof(*byaddr));
296
297 *byaddrp = NULL;
298}
